p: According to previous literature [ 17], the C. elegans was treated at 50 °C for 10 min after exposure to ethanol extract from PHS of different concentrations for 24 h, observed and photographed under stereoscopic microscope (Nikon, Japan), and measured the length of C. elegans by Image J software (Bethesda, MD, USA). Thirty C. elegans were measured in each concentration group.
